about.title: About {{ProdFullName}} API
about.content: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a robust content extraction API designed for {{EnvName}} developers. It offers tools to extract hyperlinks, structured data, images, and text from popular formats like DOCX, XLSX, PDF, HTML, and more—all without needing any external plugins.

more_features.title: Comprehensive document parsing tools
more_features.description: Along with extracting hyperlinks, {{ProdShortName}} enables you to collect other useful content like plain text, embedded media, and structured data for use in automated workflows.

feature_1.title: Accurate link detection
feature_1.content: Capture all types of hyperlinks from different document layouts, including clickable text and hidden URLs.

feature_2.title: Works with documents and web content
feature_2.content: Pull links from PDF, DOCX, XLSX, HTML, and image files that contain embedded hyperlinks.

feature_3.title: Custom extraction behavior
feature_3.content: Refine how hyperlinks are extracted using options like page ranges, link types, or content filters.
